contentList.content: Arcanist
Arcanists are wizards born with an innate ability to manipulate magic, using their unique insight into the workings of magic to apply both approaches at once.
Ritual Casting
Ritual casting allows the caster to invoke certain spells without expanding a spell slot. Currently only Find Familiar is supported.
Psychic Arcanists favor spells that target psyche, gaining knowledge of spells that normally are not available to Wizards or Sorcerers.
Psychic Arcanist

Using Sorcery Points Exploiters can invoke the effects of certain spells intuitively by bending the Weave to their will. The process has its cost as it hurts the invoker so care must be taken when using Exploits. Higher Charisma will help dampen the damage.
Exploiter
Arcane Empower

Arcane Empower increases the damage of spell with the Spellcasting Modifier of the invoker.

The effect lasts [1] turns and does [2] damage to the caster.
Exploit: Quickened Spell

Exploited spells channel raw Weave through the body of the caster to quicken spells.

The process consumes [1] Sorcery Point but hurt the invoker, causing [2] per Spell Level.
Exploit: Tripled Spell

Spells that only target 1 creature can target two additional creatures.

Costs 1 Sorcery Point per spell slot level used but drains health from the invoker. Cantrips also cost 1 Sorcery Point.
For spells that don't shoot a projectile, the targets need to be close enough together.
Exploit: Arcane Blast

The exploiter transforms its life force into energy, shaping it into a lance. The resulting blast pushes targets away from the caster. The number of lances created depend on the Arcanist's level of experience.
Psychic Expertise
Duration of spells that do <LSTag Tooltip="Psychic"> or <LSTag Tooltip="Force"> is doubled.
Psychic Mastery
Damage of spells that do <LSTag Tooltip="Psychic"> or <LSTag Tooltip="Force"> is increased.
Psychic Resilience
An innate resistance againts <LSTag Tooltip="Psychic"> and <LSTag Tooltip="Force"> damage that manifests early for Psychic Arcanists.
